body_html: Yes, as @azaks2 mentioned, if you want to use all available, set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction to 0. Using free_memory * per_process_gpu_memory_fraction will have unexpected behavior since multiple processes will get different actual number.
body_text: Yes, as @azaks2 mentioned, if you want to use all available, set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction to 0. Using free_memory * per_process_gpu_memory_fraction will have unexpected behavior since multiple processes will get different actual number.
body: Yes, as @azaks2 mentioned, if you want to use all available, set per_process_gpu_memory_fraction to 0. Using `free_memory * per_process_gpu_memory_fraction` will have unexpected behavior since multiple processes will get different actual number.
